column4: ok, thanks, should I install unbuntu or can i do that from Live CD?
ill paste it into notepad, print it off and use it when i do it lol

thin is, it works in my laptop
what type of machine are you trying to run it on?
are you using an ATI graphics card?
if you do the actual install, and come up with the same problem you'll have alot more luck fixing it as it is likely the kernel module for ati out of date or missing
